ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Claws of Veeshan faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, so we start out Glares like with the giants as opposed to Scowls?  That would indeed be handy knowledge for a trip into Skyshrine.  I found that with
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, so we start out Glares like with the giants as opposed to Scowls? That
would indeed be handy knowledge for a trip into Skyshrine. I found that
with carrillion and Sneak I could get Giant Quests if I wanted them and deal
with their merchants without getting whacked by nearby giants.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Cheryl Kiraly [mailto:cheryl@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 3:59 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Claws of Veeshan faction


I _think_ everyone starts out KoS to this faction. As a bard you can
faction song yourself above KoS in Sky Shrine.

There are two factions in Sky Shrine all up. CoV faction and amd Yelnik
*spelling* faction. or in other words the "royal family".

Jacana Mourningsong
Wood Elf Minstrel
<The Pantheon> Innoruuk
